createEvent.description: Creates a new event in Bigin

props.name: eventTitle
props.description: Provide the title or name of the event

props.name: startDateTime
props.description: Start date and time of the event

props.name: endDateTime
props.description: End date and time of the event

props.name: allDay
props.description: Mark this as an all-day event

props.name: enableRecurring
props.description: Make this event recurring

props.name: recurringInfo
props.description: Indicates the time gap between each event. The INTERVAL value range from 1 to 99. For example, an INTERVAL of 2 for a WEEKLY recurring event means that there will be a two-week gap between each event.

props.name: interval
props.description: Indicates the time gap between each event. The INTERVAL value range from 1 to 99. For example, an INTERVAL of 2 for a WEEKLY recurring event means that there will be a two-week gap between each event.

props.name: count
props.description: Indicates the number of events you want to create. THE COUNT value range from 1 to 99. For example, a COUNT of 3 creates three individual events.

props.name: byday
props.description: Indicates the day of the week the event repeats. The possible values are SU, MO, TU, WE, TH, FR, or SA. This is applicable only for weekly, and monthly events.

props.name: bymonthday
props.description: Indicates the day of the month the event repeats. The BYMONTHDAY value range from 1 to 31. This is applicable only for weekly and monthly events.

props.name: bysetpos
props.description: Indicates the week of the month the event repeats. The possible values are 1 for the first week of the month, 2 for the second week of the month, 3 the for third week of the month, 4 for the fourth week of the month, or -1 for the last week of the month. This is applicable only for weekly and monthly events.

props.name: until
props.description: Date the recurrence ends. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

props.name: enableReminder
props.description: Enable reminder for this event

props.name: reminderInfo
props.description: Add multiple reminders (e.g., "1 hour", "30 minutes")

props.name: reminderList
props.description: Add multiple reminders (e.g., "1 hour", "30 minutes")

props.name: unit
props.description: Number of time units (e.g., 1, 30)

props.name: venue
props.description: Location or venue of the event

props.name: relatedModule
props.description: Select the type of entity the event is related to

props.name: relatedTo
props.description: Select the specific record the event is related to

props.name: participants
props.description: Add participants to the event

props.name: participant
props.description: User ID, email address, or contact ID based on type

props.name: description
props.description: Additional descriptions or notes related to the event
